mapper.select: SELECT SMALLCATEGORY_CODE as code, SMALLCATEGORY_NAME as name FROM CATEGORY_SMALL WHERE SMALLCATEGORY_CODE = #{smallcategory_code}

select * from( select 'sigunguTotal' as code, count(smallcategory_code) as count from store where Sigungu_code = #{guCode} UNION select smallcategory_code, nvl(count(smallcategory_code),0) from store group by sigungu_code, smallcategory_code having Sigungu_code = #{guCode} and smallcategory_code = #{smallCode}) order by 2 desc

select distinct sigungu_code as guCode, MAINCATEGORY_CODE as mainCode, round((thsmon_up+thsmon_dw)/2,0) as avgSum, round((thsmon_dw_co+thsmon_up_co)/2,0) as avgCount from Salse where MAINCATEGORY_CODE = #{mainCode} and sigungu_code = #{guCode}

select * from (select F.SIGUNGU_name as guName, sig.SIGUNGU_code as guCode, round((N.total/(N.total+F.total))*100,2) as newRate, round((F.total/(N.total+F.total))*100,2) as failRate from Seoul_failplayer F, Seoul_newplayer N, sigungu sig where f.SIGUNGU_name = n.SIGUNGU_name and f.SIGUNGU_name = sig.SIGUNGU_name) where guCode = #{guCode}
select Sigungu_code as code, round((POPULATION/area),0)as density from seoul_pop where sigungu_code=#{guCode}
